LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Accounted__c.description: Indicates whether the record is already considered for updating the Balance record.

cgcloud__Allow_Manual_Creation__c.description: Indicates whether it's possible to manually create the initial inventory and Balance record.

cgcloud__Balance__c.description: This technical field is created to update the Total balance value in Inventory (Roll-up Summary field). The checkbox value is updated by updating the workflow field.

cgcloud__Charge_Date__c.description: Date on which the inventory is to be physically charged by this transaction.

cgcloud__Creation_Date__c.description: Date on which the inventory is created.

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Specifies the currency of the cash inventory.

cgcloud__Inventory_Transaction_Template_.description: Reference to the inventory transaction template.

cgcloud__Order_Item__c.description: Reference to the order item for a product-related transaction.

cgcloud__Order_Payment__c.description: References to the ID of the order payment related to the inventory transaction.

cgcloud__Payment_Method__c.description: Specifies the payment method for the cash transaction.
